definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
wretched feelings (opposite: 樂趣|乐趣, delight)
to surpass/to transcend/to perform religious ceremonies to help the soul find peace
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
